The Battle of Polytopia

Turn-based 4X-lite—tight matches and simple inputs make it a natural fit for Tesla; more modes at home.

Polytopia compresses 4X strategy into bite-sized matches. Explore, expand, exploit, exterminate—each turn is quick, which makes it a comfy fit in-car. At home you unlock richer tribe selections and proper online lobbies.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Skirmish style; great for short, thinky sessions.
  • Controller required: No
  • Local co-op: No
  • Plays well without a controller.
  • Turn-based pacing is perfect for parked play.
